sentences.english: You dance well. Do you breakdance?
sentences.chinese: 你的舞跳得真好，你跳霹靂舞嗎？

sentences.english: Black people are world renowned rappers, basketball players and break dancers.
sentences.chinese: 黑人是國際知名的說唱歌手，籃球運動員和霹靂舞者。

sentences.english: The culminating point of the performance was the break dance in the end.
sentences.chinese: 臨結束時的霹靂舞將表演推向了高潮。

sentences.english: This signaled to all of the dancers that it was time for breakdancing.
sentences.chinese: 這示意所有跳舞的人，跳霹靂舞的時間到了。

sentences.english: Learn upper body stretches for breakdancing in this free video hip hop dance lesson.
sentences.chinese: 上體伸展瞭解在這個自由視頻街舞課的霹靂舞。

sentences.english: However, until now there had been no comprehensive studies of break dancing injuries.
sentences.chinese: 然而，到現在也沒有對霹靂舞受傷進行全面的研究。

sentences.english: Have you ever tried break dance？
Russian Cossack dancing is followed by break-dancing and an interpretive scarf dance.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯哥薩克舞蹈之後是霹靂舞和演繹過來的紗巾舞。

sentences.english: Kids were break-dancing at the street corner.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們在街道的拐角處跳霹靂舞。

sentences.english: And he’s now doing the famous moonwalk, which he picked up from break dancing.
sentences.chinese: 他從霹靂舞中提取出著名的太空步也在這時出現了。

sentences.english: Learning how to breakdance involves a certain amount of preparation.
sentences.chinese: 學習如何跳霹靂舞涉及一定數額的準備。

definition: lit. spouting smoke through the seven orifices (idiom)/fig. to seethe with anger
to spike the ball (volleyball etc)/to smash (tennis etc)
success across the board/victory in everything one touches
